#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <sstream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    string s;
    int a;
    cin >> s >> a;
    stringstream ss(s);
    int v = 0;
    char c;
    while (ss >> c) {
      v = (v * 10 + c - '0') % a;
    }
    cout << (v ? "NO" : "YES") << endl;
  }
}
